ingredients.item: 100g pot Seafood & Eat It Fifty Fifty Cornish Crab
1 large Waitrose British Blacktail Egg, white only, beaten
½ x 20g pack dill, leaves only, roughly chopped
2 tsp small capers in brine, drained
1 Waitrose Duchy Organic Ridge Cucumber, peeled, deseeded and diced
Pea shoots and 2 tbsp fat free Greek yogurt, to serve

instructions.step: Chop the fish into small pieces, then mix with the crab, egg white and dill. Season. Shape into 6 patties and chill for 10 minutes.
Whisk together the mustard, vinegar and sugar. Add the capers. Mix with the cucumber, and set aside.

Heat the oil in a non-stick frying pan. Dust the fishcakes with the flour, then cook for 2 minutes on each side or until the fishcakes are firm and golden. Serve with the cucumber salad, pea shoots and some Greek yogurt.
